actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of funds for the renovation of, and certain operating and maintenance costs of, the Benjamin Franklin National Memorial at the Franklin Institute, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into agreements for: (1) the renovation, refurbishment, maintenance, and operation of the Benjamin Franklin National Memorial at the Franklin Institute in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania; and (2) the design and presentation of educational programs for the Memorial. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of funds for the renovation of, and certain operating and maintenance costs of, the Benjamin Franklin National Memorial at the Franklin Institute, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
